name: Easy Daysies Starter Kit
description: MOST POPULAR This is the "Must-Have" for every family! Get kids organized and into routine in a snap! This kit includes the Apple Tree or Daisy Fold-&-Go and all 18 magnets from the Easy Daysies Every Day Kit. Personalize the board with your child's name using the included dry-erase marker. Put magnets down the middle or use the "TO DO" and "DONE" columns for a reward system. Kids can hang or bring their daily routine anywhere: from home to grandma's, or to the Baby-Sitter's! Magnets are made in Canada with 70% recycled material.

name: Easy Daysies BEST Sellers Bundle
description:
This bundle includes the 5 most popular Easy Daysies® kits.

Bundle includes:

• Easy Daysies Starter Kit with Every Day magnets, Fold & Go magnetic board (Apple Tree design) and dry erase marker.
• Chores & Rewards Kit
• Family Activities Kit
• Extracurricular Kit
• Special Times & Clocks Kit

With the 57 most popular magnets, including clocks and blank magnets, a dry erase marker and a Fold & Go magnetic board, this bundle has everything you need to start having easier days right now!

name: Every Day Kit
description:
Get kids organized and into routine with the Every Day Kit!

Includes 18 amazing, coloured, durable magnets (perfect for little hands) that you can use on your fridge, kitchen door, or pocket chart (or the Easy Daysies™ Fold & Go!). Use this kit alone or mix and match it with other kits!

This is a great basic kit that every home should have! Perfect for:

• Every Day!
• Birthday Gift
• Special Needs
• Home Schooling
• Learning English

Magnets in this kit: Breakfast, Brush Teeth (2), Get Dressed, Pack Backpack, School, Nap Time, Clean Up, Dinner, Bath Time, Bed Time, Wash Hands & Face, Make Bed, Lunch, Snack (Break), Homework, Play/Free Time.

The entire product is proudly designed and created in Canada.

For ages 3-12

name: Chores & Rewards Kit
description:
This popular kit is loved by parents and kids! It can be used alone but it is perfect for mixing with the Every Day Kit.

Use a dry erase marker to check the white boxes below the task your child completes and reward him or her when all six boxes are checked!

The blank magnets in this kit are perfect for helping little ones learn routines and tasks as well. Enjoy using the blanks for tasks like: "Sitting Still and Eating Dinner", "Do Homework", "Go To Bed without Complaining", etc.!  Includes 9 amazing, coloured, durable magnets (perfect for little hands) that you can use on your fridge, kitchen door, or pocket chart.

This is a great basic expansion kit that every home should have! Great and unique birthday gift idea!  Great educational gift for home schooling, getting kids organized and into routine, and a helpful tool for children with special needs too!

Magnets in this kit:  Feed Pet, Clean Bedroom, Clean Bathroom, Do Dishes, Help Set Table, Vacuum, Walk the Dog, two blank magnets for you to fill in.

The entire product is proudly designed and created in Canada.

For ages 3-12

name: Family Activities Kit
description: Do you have a play date or a dentist appointment? Includes 9 amazing, coloured, durable magnets! This expansion kit is a "must have" for the Every Day Kit! Your kids will love seeing these add-ons in their routine! This is a great kit that every home should have! Match this with the Every Day Kit and you have the perfect birthday gift! Great educational gift for home-schooling, getting kids organized and into routine, great for kids learning English, and a helpful tool for children with special needs too! Magnets in this kit: Shopping, Church, Doctor, Play Date, party, Movie Night, Play Outside, dentist, a blank magnet for you to fill in using a dry erase marker. The entire product is proudly designed and created in Canada. For ages 3-12
